mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW_TBL (REW_NUM, USER_ID, PRO_NUM, REW_CONTENT, REW_SCORE) VALUES (seq_rew_num.NEXTVAL, #{user_id}, #{pro_num}, #{rew_content}, #{rew_score})
mapper.select: SELECT REW_NUM, USER_ID, PRO_NUM, REW_CONTENT, REW_SCORE, STA_DATE FROM(SELECT REW_NUM, USER_ID, PRO_NUM, REW_CONTENT, REW_SCORE, STA_DATE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY REW_NUM DESC) P_SEQ FROM REVIEW_TBL WHERE PRO_NUM = #{pro_num}) WHERE P_SEQ BETWEEN #{cri.rowStart} AND #{cri.rowEnd}
